x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: Duplicate Clinical Devices Asset Tag : Assets with Duplicate asset tag for pre-Qatar versions.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Duplicate Clinical Devices Asset Tag
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation:
Need to Add Duplicate Validation Business Rule on the Devices table to prevent duplicate asset tags.
OR
Upgrade to Qatar(It is available in Qatar or Higher versions)

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_e3fade641b85d910ae5b21b5ec4bcbf6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Duplicate Clinical Devices Asset Tag : Assets with Duplicate asset tag for pre-Qatar versions.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Duplicate Clinical Devices Asset Tag</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Need to Add Duplicate Validation Business Rule on the Devices table to prevent duplicate asset tags.

OR 

Upgrade to Qatar(It is available in Qatar or Higher versions)</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
//Checking if connected workplace version is previous Of Qatar 
var nuvoloVersionQuery = "name=Connected Workplace^active=true^version<18";
var nuvoloVersion = new GlideRecord("sys_scope");
nuvoloVersion.addEncodedQuery(nuvoloVersionQuery);
nuvoloVersion.query();
if (nuvoloVersion.next()) {
    util.handleOutput('If you are experiencing duplicate asset tage or validation,need to Add Duplicate Validation Business Rule on Devices table. It is available on Pakistan or Higher versions. ', 'warning', 'HTM Asset Management');
} else {
    var validationBR = new GlideRecord('sys_script');
    validationBR.addEncodedQuery('sys_id=bb8c06621b70c954c8398480cd4bcb8a');
    validationBR.query();
    if (!validationBR.next()) {
        util.handleOutput('Please Confirm Validation Business Rule is present. The name of Business Rule is "Validate Duplicate Clinical Asset Tag." ', 'warning', 'HTM Asset Management');
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Prasanna.Phadtare@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-29 09:33:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>e3fade641b85d910ae5b21b5ec4bcbf6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Duplicate Clinical Devices Asset Tag</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_e3fade641b85d910ae5b21b5ec4bcbf6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:34</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
